name: 8-ple
description:
This is a small JAM game made for the Synty Art and Game Jam's 8 birthday celebration.

The name of the game sort of implies the story of the game... we need to gather 8 apples, but first you need to talk to Pops (the merchant).

Controls:

WASD to move
E to interact (pickup items, and talk to merchant)
ESC to pause the game

Assets Used:

POLYGON - Adventure Pack

  • Character_Warrior_White + Characters Black Material for Merchant
  • SM_Bld_Fence_02
  • SM_Bld_Stall_01
  • SM_Env_Rock_09
  • SM_Env_Tree_016 + PolyAdventureMaterial_02 for Apple Trees
  • SM_Item_Fruit_02

POLYGON - Greybox Pack

  • SM_Prop_Greybox_01
